greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of series-reduced rooted trees whose leaves are multisets of colors with a total of n elements using exactly k colors.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1275 (first 50 rows)
program: R(n, k)={my(v=[]); for(n=1, n, v=concat(v, EulerT(concat(v, [binomial(n+k-1, k-1)]))[n])); v}
M(n)={my(v=vector(n, k, R(n, k)~)); Mat(vector(n, k, sum(i=1, k, (-1)^(k-i)*binomial(k, i)*v[i])))}
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Dec 29 2019
